casebody.data:
FEDERAL NATIONAL MORTGAGE ASSOCIATION
v.
Ricky MORNEAU, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 28, 2017

Ricky Morneau, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Adam L. Avallone, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn. App. 904, 156 A.3d 694 (2017), is denied.
